headline.main: What Unhealthy Products Should CVS Stop Selling?

docs.abstract: Seeing itself as a health care company, CVS will stop selling tobacco products. Why stop there?
docs.snippet: Seeing itself as a health care company, CVS will stop selling tobacco products. Why stop there?

headline.print_headline: Surgeon General Nominee Pledges Focus on Obesity
headline.main: Surgeon General Nominee Pledges Focus on Obesity

docs.lead_paragraph: The Obama administration's nominee for surgeon general says his top priorities will be fighting obesity and helping communities promote healthier living.
docs.snippet: The Obama administration's nominee for surgeon general says his top priorities will be fighting obesity and helping communities promote healthier living.

headline.print_headline: Sugar Tied to Fatal Heart Woes; Soda's a Culprit
headline.main: Sugar Tied to Fatal Heart Woes; Soda's a Culprit

docs.lead_paragraph: Could too much sugar be deadly? The biggest study of its kind suggests the answer is yes, at least when it comes to fatal heart problems.
docs.snippet: Could too much sugar be deadly? The biggest study of its kind suggests the answer is yes, at least when it comes to fatal heart problems.
